TopicTitle: How to dock incredibly massive craft?

Articles.Content: I'm talkin' a magic boulder and a class E asteroid with long crew sections in between! Next to impossible! PLEASE SEND HELP!
The process would be the same. Just do it more slowly so they don't build up excessive momentum.
Or... When in doubt, MecJeb it!
Oh, and moved to questions since it's seeking help rather than offering.

If both your ships are equally huge: you go really slow. Also, make sure you got RCS centered around the CoM.

If one ship is relatively small, and the other one huge: dock with the small one!
